content:
IFixedTypeInfo Interface

In this Article

Provides a substitute for ITypeInfo by modifying the definitions of crosoft.Build.Tasks.IFixedTypeInfo.GetRefTypeOfImplType* and crosoft.Build.Tasks.IFixedTypeInfo.GetRefTypeInfo*.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Guid("00020401-0000-0000-C000-000000000046")]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.InterfaceType(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComInterfaceType.InterfaceIsIUnknown)]
public interface IFixedTypeInfo

  • CreateInstance(Object,Guid,Object)

    For a description of this member, see stem.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.CreateInstance*.

    Parameters

    • pUnkOuter

    • ppvObj

  • GetContainingTypeLib(ITypeLib,Int32)

    • pBstrName
      IntPtr

      The name of the entry point.

    • pwOrdinal
      IntPtr

      The ordinal value of the entry point.

  • GetDocumentation(Int32,String,String,Int32,String)

    For a description of this member, see stem.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.GetDocumentation*.

    public void GetDocumentation (int index, out string strName, out string strDocString, out int dwHelpContext, out string strHelpFile);

    • index

      The index of the documentation article.

    • strName

      The name of the topic.

    • strDocString

      The name of the documentation.

    • dwHelpContext
      Int32

      The context number of the help article.

    • strHelpFile
      String

      The name of the help file.

    For a description of this member, see stem.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.GetFuncDesc*.

    Parameters

    • index

    • ppFuncDesc

      Location to return a pointer to the description.

  • GetIDsOfNames(String[],Int32,Int32[])

    For a description of this member, see stem.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.GetIDsOfNames*.

    public void GetIDsOfNames (string[] rgszNames, int cNames, int[] pMemId);

    Parameters

    • cNames

    • pMemId

      Location to return the description.

    For a description of this member, see stem.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.GetImplTypeFlags*.

      Location to return the flags.

  • GetMops(Int32,String)

    For a description of this member, see stem.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.GetMops*.

    Parameters

    • memid

      Identifier for the Mops.

    • pBstrMops
      String

      Location to return the Mops.

  • GetNames(Int32,String[],Int32,Int32)

    For a description of this member, see stem.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.GetNames*.

    public void GetNames (int memid, string[] rgBstrNames, int cMaxNames, out int pcNames);

    Parameters

    • memid
      Int32

      Identifier for the member.

    • rgBstrNames
      String[]

      Location to return the name.

    • cMaxNames
      Int32

      The number of bytes allocated at rgBstrNames.

    • pcNames
      Int32

      Location to return the number of names.

  • GetRefTypeInfo(IntPtr,IFixedTypeInfo)

    Retrieves the referenced type descriptions if a type description references other type descriptions.

    public void GetRefTypeInfo (IntPtr hRef, out Microsoft.Build.Tasks.IFixedTypeInfo ppTI);

    Parameters

    • hRef
      IntPtr

      A handle to the referenced type description to return.

    • ppTI
      IFixedTypeInfo

      When this method returns, contains the referenced type description. This parameter is passed uninitialized.

  • GetRefTypeOfImplType(Int32,IntPtr)

    Retrieves the type description of the implemented interface types if a type description describes a COM class.

    public void GetRefTypeOfImplType (int index, out IntPtr href);

    Parameters

    • index
      Int32

      The index of the implemented type whose handle is returned.

    • href
      IntPtr

      When this method returns, contains a reference to a handle for the implemented interface. This parameter is passed uninitialized.

  • GetTypeAttr(IntPtr)

    For a description of this member, see stem.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.GetTypeAttr*.

    public void GetTypeAttr (out IntPtr ppTypeAttr);

    Parameters

    • ppTypeAttr
      IntPtr

      Location to return the type attributes.

  • GetTypeComp(ITypeComp)

    For a description of this member, see stem.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.GetTypeComp*.

    public void GetTypeComp (out System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeComp ppTComp);

    Parameters

    • ppTComp
      ITypeComp

      Location to return the type comp.

  • GetVarDesc(Int32,IntPtr)

    For a description of this member, see stem.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.GetVarDesc*.

    public void GetVarDesc (int index, out IntPtr ppVarDesc);

    Parameters

    • index
      Int32

      Index of the variable.

    • ppVarDesc
      IntPtr

      Location to return the description.

  • Invoke(Object,Int32,Int16,DISPPARAMS,IntPtr,IntPtr,Int32)

    For a description of this member, see stem.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.Invoke*.

    public void Invoke (object pvInstance, int memid, short wFlags, ref System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.DISPPARAMS pDispParams, IntPtr pVarResult, IntPtr pExcepInfo, out int puArgErr);

    Parameters

    • pvInstance
      Object

      Pointer to an instance of the interface described by this type description.

    • memid
      Int32

      Identifies the interface member.

    • wFlags
      Int16

      Flags describing the context of the invoke call, as follows:

      DISPATCH_METHOD if the member is accessed as a method. If there is ambiguity, both this and the DISPATCH_PROPERTYGET flag can be set.

      DISPATCH_PROPERTYGET if the member is retrieved as a property or data member.

      DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUT if the member is changed as a property or data member.

      DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUTREF if the member is changed by using a reference assignment, rather than a value assignment. This value is only valid when the property accepts a reference to an object.

    • pDispParams
      DISPPARAMS

      Points to a structure that contains an array of arguments, an array of DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts of the number of elements in each array.

    • pVarResult
      IntPtr

      Should be Null if the caller does not expect any result. Otherwise, it should be a pointer to the location at which the result is to be stored. If wFlags specifies DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUT or DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUTREF, pVarResultis ignored.

    • pExcepInfo
      IntPtr

      Points to an exception information structure, which is filled in only if DISP_E_EXCEPTION is returned. If pExcepInfois Null on input, only an HRESULT error will be returned.

    • puArgErr
      Int32

      If Invoke returns DISP_E_TYPEMISMATCH, puArgErr indicates the index (within rgvarg) of the argument with incorrect type. If more than one argument returns an error, puArgErr indicates only the first argument with an error. Arguments in pDispParams->rgvarg appear in reverse order, so the first argument is the one having the highest index in the array. Cannot be Null.

  • ReleaseFuncDesc(IntPtr)

    For a description of this member, see stem.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.ReleaseFuncDesc*.

    public void ReleaseFuncDesc (IntPtr pFuncDesc);

    Parameters

    • pFuncDesc
      IntPtr

      Pointer to the FUNCDESC to be freed.

  • ReleaseTypeAttr(IntPtr)

    For a description of this member, see stem.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.ReleaseTypeAttr*.

    public void ReleaseTypeAttr (IntPtr pTypeAttr);

    Parameters

    • pTypeAttr
      IntPtr

      Pointer to the TYPEATTR to be freed.

  • ReleaseVarDesc(IntPtr)

    For a description of this member, see stem.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.ReleaseVarDesc*.

    public void ReleaseVarDesc (IntPtr pVarDesc);

    Parameters

    • pVarDesc
      IntPtr

      Pointer to the VARDESC to be freed.
